item.description:
It's a cookout type thing in my backyard.  Nobody should feel obligated to bring anything, but I know some people really want to.  In that case any cookout type thing (salad, soda, chips, etc.) works.   It's also BYOB.  There will be no alcohol served, but people are welcome  to bring their own, so long as someone sober is doing the driving home.

 

*You will get to meet and mingle with members of the Connecticut Valley Atheists at the party.

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Dennis Himes Presents: Solstice Party
